definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱們暫時不要考慮，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony of the New York branch of CCB was held on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 中國建設銀行紐約分行開幕儀式在星期五舉行。

sentences.english: AT seven-thirty Friday evening Scali passed this word along.
sentences.chinese: 星期五晚上七時半，斯卡利把話傳了過去。

sentences.english: Lana said that she wouldn't go to Marcia's house on Friday night.
sentences.chinese: 蘭娜說星期五晚上她不會去馬西婭家。

sentences.english: We go to Shabbat dinner every Friday.
sentences.chinese: 每個星期五，我們都去參加安息日晚宴。

sentences.english: The children should be allowed to go to the movies with friends on Friday nights.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們該當被容許星期五早晨和冤家們一同去看影戲。

sentences.english: It's Friday. The store is open until 9:00 tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天是星期五，這家店要營業到九點鐘。

sentences.english: It’s no doubt that Black Friday will be busier this year than it ever has been.
sentences.chinese: 毋容置疑，今年的黑色星期五將會更爲繁忙。

sentences.english: The meeting has been provisionally arranged for 3.00 pm next Friday.
sentences.chinese: 會議時間暫定爲下星期五下午三時。

sentences.english: He is lunching me well at the Friday Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他在星期五飯店招待我喫豐盛的午餐。

sentences.english: Palestinians ride horses on the beach of Gaza City on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒星期五，巴基斯坦人在加沙城的海灘上騎馬。
特科於星期五逝世，享年96歲。

sentences.english: The shop closes early on Friday.
She said she was having a surprise party for Lana on Friday night.
sentences.chinese: 她說星期五她要舉行一個爲蘭娜準備的驚喜聚會。

sentences.english: Oh, great. Dr. Johnson will be available on Friday afternoon this week.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，約翰遜大夫本週星期五下午有空。
